issue_name: Threat Actors Exploiting Ivanti EPMM Vulnerabilities

1.description: Upgrade Ivanti EPMM versions to the latest version as soon as possible. See Ivanti CVE-2023-35081 - Remote Arbitrary File Write for patch information. This patch protects against CVE-2023-35078 and CVE-2023-35081.

2.command: Login to command line shell (CLI) in enable mode
2.description: Login to command line shell (CLI) in enable mode.

3.description: Run the following command to apply the Ivanti-provided RPM fix for CVE-35078.
